title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.15 - Display of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.15 - Display of license

State Regulations
A licensed authorized games of chance lessor must
prominently display its license or any amendment thereof on the premises where
games of chance are conducted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4606.15

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
